com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfTemplate

  • public class RtfTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is able to make variable substitutions in an existing RTF file. 
     Rtf.template( new FileInputStream("template.rtf) )
    .inject( "ADDRESSLINE1", "tutego" )
    .inject( "ADDRESSLINE2", bold("Sonsbeck") )
    .out( FileOutputStream("out.rtf") );
    Just use ASCII-keys.

    • Method Detail

      • inject

        public RtfTemplate inject(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        Adds key/values pairs for a variable substitution. Keep the keys in pure ASCII.
        Parameters:
        map - Map with key/value pairs.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • inject

        public RtfTemplate inject(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.Object value)
        Adds a key/value pair for substitution. Keep the key in pure ASCII. The value will be converted to String by String.valueOf(Object).
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        value - Value.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • out

        public java.lang.String out()
        Performs the variable transformation and returns the transformed RTF document.
        Returns:
        RTF document after variable substitution.

      • out

        public void out(java.io.OutputStream out)
        Performs the variable transformation and writes the RTF document and send the output to an Appendable. This method closes the Appendable after writing if its of type Closeable.
        Parameters:
        out - Destination of this RTF output.
